changeSet.author: patience-mpofu
changeSet.comment: This change set migrates the Role and Role_AUD tables from an integer id primary key to a UUID of type BINARY(16).
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE Role ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE Role_AUD ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE Permission_Role_AUD ADD roles_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER roles_id;

ALTER TABLE User_Role_AUD ADD roles_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER roles_id;

ALTER TABLE Permission_Role ADD roles_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER roles_id;

ALTER TABLE User_Role ADD roles_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(roles_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER roles_id;
UPDATE Role_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN Role AS joinTable ON (updateTable.id_temp = joinTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.id = joinTable.id WHERE joinTable.id IS NOT null;
DELETE Role_AUD FROM Role_AUD LEFT JOIN Role AS joinTable ON (Role_AUD.id = joinTable.id) WHERE joinTable.id IS null
UPDATE Permission_Role AS updateTable LEFT JOIN Role AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.roles_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.roles_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
UPDATE User_Role AS updateTable LEFT JOIN Role AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.roles_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.roles_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;

UPDATE Permission_Role_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN Role AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.roles_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.roles_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
UPDATE User_Role_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN Role AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.roles_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.roles_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
